meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Hammon Julie Singer Chip Bell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6761.

td.p: Bill Hammon, a video editor and freelance writer from Bristol, Connecticut
Julie Singer, a French professor from St. Louis, Missouri
Chip Bell, a telecom engineer from Marysville, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,300)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '[Alex reads the clue, and every clue in the category, with a Scottish brogue.]

New Year\'s Eve

Bill
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Bill] Who is "Mankini"?)
(Bill: Watch The Soup.)
BillWhat is Mankini
$4,600
ChipWhat is the Office of the Exchequer?
$1,000
JulieWhat is Chancellor of the Exchequer?
$4,000
the Chancellor of the Exchequer')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This office is named for a tablecloth imprinted with squares that was once used as an abacus')

tr.td: This office is named for a tablecloth imprinted with squares that was once used as an abacus

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
